Class DominoTrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • DominoTrain

  • public class DominoTrain
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent a Domino Train
    Author:
    Brian Nguyen - nbn10

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DominoTrain(int startValue)
      Creates an initially empty train and initialize the starting value of each train

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Domino checkDomino(Domino domino)
      Check if the back of the domino is equal to the end of the train.

      get the current end value of the train (the "back" value of the last domino in the train)

      return the starting value of the domino train

        public boolean isOpen()
        Check if the train is open
        Returns:
        true if the train is open, false otherwise

        Set the status of the train (open or closed)
        Parameters:
        isOpen - true if the train should be open, false if closed

        add a domino to the front of the train
        Parameters:

      • getEndValue

        public int getEndValue()
        get the current end value of the train (the "back" value of the last domino in the train)
        Returns:
        the current end value of the train (the "back" value of the last domino in the train)

      • canAdd

        public boolean canAdd(Domino domino)
        Check if this domino can be added to the train
        Parameters:
        domino - the domino that want to add
        Returns:
        true if this domino can be added to the train. Otherwise, false.

      • addToBackTrain

        public void addToBackTrain(Domino domino)
        Add the domino to the back of the train
        Parameters:
        domino - the domino that want to add to the back of the train

      • checkDomino

        public Domino checkDomino(Domino domino)
        Check if the back of the domino is equal to the end of the train. If yes, rotate the domino. If no, keep the domino.
        Parameters:
        domino - the domino that want to check
        Returns:
        the domino after being rotate or the same domino input
